team.name: Joe
team.title: Licensed Paint Contractor
bioFacts: Goal is to help maintain home or small business and assist with projects
Company based on the belief that customers' needs are of the utmost importance
High percentage of business are repeat customers
Known for superior craftsmanship, attention to detail, clear communication, honesty and integrity

services.name: Paint Contractor Services
services.description: Professional painting services for residential and small business properties, including interior and exterior painting. Known for prompt, professional, affordable, and high-quality craftsmanship with a customer-focused approach.

services.name: Handy Services
services.category: General Home or Small Business Maintenance and Projects
services.description: Assistance with various home or small business maintenance and general projects, provided by a licensed paint contractor, ensuring reliability and skill.
